Relax on sofa
I turn on the tv and sit in the sofa. I watch the tv and fall asleep.


[WALK] <home_office> (1.319)
[WALK] <television> (1.410)
[FIND] <television> (1.410)
[SWITCHON] <television> (1.410)
[FIND] <couch> (1.352)
[SIT] <couch> (1.352)
[TURNTO] <television> (1.410)
[WATCH] <television> (1.410)
[SLEEP]
